name: Ghost Simulator Game | Survival in Haunted Island
name_original: Ghost Simulator Game | Survival in Haunted Island
description:
The battle of ghosts in a dark Halloween night filled with many evil souls , monsters , wraiths and demons . Who will be the strongest in this battle ? This game simulates haunted land which is full of death , slaughter and scary . The only strongest one will survive !!!
The moon shines in the Halloween night . A lot of shadows of ghost and monster appear such as skeleton who was a prisoner and was tortured to death , evil wraith swordsman who was killed in the war and monsters like snake , spider and rat born of spirit with resentment and hatred to fight and hunt for the strongest one . Who will survive ? Kill or be killed ? At this battle , the only strongest one will survive . Lich Mage is the great and talented magician with the ambitions makes him study black magic and spell . He cursed himself to be immortal . Even his body is dead and rotted to the skeleton , It made him alive to live as a ghost . He is the main character of this game .

◆◆◆ HOW TO PLAY ◆◆◆
- Control the character by joystick to kill and hunt
- Upgrade the abilities
- Fight boss in each zone.

◆◆◆ GAME FEATURES ◆◆◆
- Smooth realistic character control
- Missions and upgrade abilities and system
- The ultimate character
- Three beautiful world scene (the graveyard , the desert , the boss room)
- Enthusiastic music , noises and sounds
- Beautiful UI , button , animation and effect
